column4: Hi I have no sound at all on my comp with ubuntu and I know nothing about linux can soume one help me please?
ravager - ok. So how do I fix it? lol
I need to get into the sound config but dont know how
tried that it said bash: aslamixer: command not found
I had no sound on my ubuntu 1 hour ago
a guy in here helped me out
now u get the commands, I got :P
dont have to paste it all
the command I gave you there was the last command I executed, and I had sound
try sudo killall pulseaudio; start pulseaudio-x11 again
